name: Glitcher of the Cosmata
description:
Glitcher of the Cosmata is a Deck-building Roguelike inspired by Slay the Spire and Library of Ruina which designed, developed by TEAM Destinii

Reminder: This version is not balancing content and gameplay yet

This is our senior project and still a work in progress, however, We will keep updating and accompanying you. The final version of the game will be released around this Q2. We're looking forward to seeing you again in the final version, so stay tuned. Thank you and love to all of you guys! 

Most of gameplay code and assets were made by us. and some bought/free assets
